pyunitwizard.get_form¶

pyunitwizard.get_form(quantity_or_unit)[source]¶

Placeholder function to show example docstring (NumPy format) Replace this function and doc string for your own project :Parameters: with_attribution (bool, Optional, default: True) – Set whether or not to display who the quote is from

Returns

quote – Compiled string including quote and optional attribution

Return type

str
